p: What about covid-19 and oxidative stress? SARS-CoV2, probably like other RNA viruses [ 4] can trigger an oxidative stress. This hypothesis can easily be checked by the dosage of oxidative stress markers [ 7] in the blood of sick people of COVID-19. A cytokin storm with hyper inflammation had been found in these patients [ 9] but researchers should also chek for a possible oxidative storm with all he deleterious effects of RONS, notably lipid peroxydation and proteins oxidation of membranes which can contribute to the transformation, hyalinization of pulmonary alveolar membranes [ 11] with letal respiratory distress. As elders and people suffering of diabetes, hypertension and cardiovascular diseases have already a state of oxidative stress [ 2, 3], viral infection will increasae this stress, giving us one possible explanation of the severity of COVID-19 in these categories of patients [ 12].
